name: 4P²
description:
In 4P² (Four Player Squared) you play with up to 3 other friends navigating dangerous levels while both cooperating and competing. Carry each other to the finish line but fight over who gets the most points!

- 4 player co-opetition gameplay where you cooperate to finish the level while simultaneously competing for high scores!

- Death is a mechanic! Sacrifice yourself to provide a path for your friends, but don't all fail or you'll have to restart!

- Custom level editor to create your own friendly and/or terrifying puzzles.

- Load in your own music because I don't care do what you want!
